name: task_manager
description: Manages a simple todo list with add and list operations

add_task.description: Add a new task to the todo list

text.description: The text of the task to add

success.description: True if the task was added successfully

list_tasks.description: List all tasks in the todo list

delete_task.description: Delete a task from the todo list

task_id.description: The ID of the task to delete

success.description: True if the task was deleted successfully

update_task.description: Update an existing task in the todo list

task_id.description: The ID of the task to update

new_text.description: The new text for the task

success.description: True if the task was updated successfully

get_task.description: Get details of a specific task

task_id.description: The ID of the task to retrieve

clear_tasks.description: Clear all tasks from the todo list

success.description: True if all tasks were cleared successfully

search_tasks.description: Search for tasks containing a specific keyword

keyword.description: The keyword to search for in task texts

get_task_count.description: Get the total number of tasks in the todo list

get_task_summary.description: Get a summary of all tasks in the todo list
